info.name: DNS SaaS Service Detection
author: noah @thesubtlety
pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13067
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;espace-membre.incubateur.net.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 13067
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;espace-membre.incubateur.net.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
espace-membre.incubateur.net.	3600	IN	CNAME	secretariat-beta.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4691
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;espace-membre.incubateur.net.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4691
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232
; EDE: 18 (Prohibited): ()

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;espace-membre.incubateur.net.	IN	 CAA

;; ANSWER SECTION:
espace-membre.incubateur.net.	3600	IN	CNAME	secretariat-beta.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.
secretariat-beta.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	300	IN	CNAME	sc-lb-pool-01.osc-fr1.scalingo-network.com.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
scalingo-network.com.	1800	IN	SOA	burt.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2323953355 10000 2400 604800 1800

info.name: HttpOnly Cookie - Detect
author: mr. bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: espace-membre.incubateur.net
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 Found
Connection: close
Content-Length: 35
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Date: Sun, 03 Dec 2023 10:03:24 GMT
Location: /login?next=/
Ratelimit-Limit: 10000
Ratelimit-Remaining: 9863
Ratelimit-Reset: 25181
Set-Cookie: espaceMembreCookieName=s%3ApSZXW3DvCHPSkxvHfK5-aVM96riUkyDt.uPviL0TPeHapcTjE5wbjJy3HcR1kv03Kk6pCKkGxmP4; Path=/; Expires=Sun, 10 Dec 2023 10:03:24 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=Lax
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
Vary: Origin, Accept, Accept-Encoding
X-Powered-By: Express
X-Request-Id: 58298b79-9689-4d57-b7a7-35947f70c0b2

Found. Redirecting to /login?next=/

info.name: CHIYU TCP/IP Converter - Cross-Site Scripting
author: geeknik
info.description: CHIYU BF-430, BF-431 and BF-450M TCP/IP Converter devices contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability due to a lack of sanitization of the input on the components man.cgi, if.cgi, dhcpc.cgi, and ppp.cgi.
info.remediation: To mitigate this vulnerability, ensure that all user-supplied input is properly validated and sanitized before being rendered in web pages.

request:
GET /if.cgi?redirect=setting.htm&failure=fail.htm&type=ap_tcps_apply&TF_ip=443&TF_submask=0&TF_submask=%22%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert%282Z1m64GJqwluBpgTb4WkWHKHE80%29%3C%2Fscript%3E&radio_ping_block=0&max_tcp=3&B_apply=APPLY HTTP/1.1
Host: espace-membre.incubateur.net
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Authorization: Basic OmFkbWlu
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 03 Dec 2023 10:03:33 GMT Etag: W/"1689-ExtX/mFfssr0zXYtnQiPIYP7Zhw" Ratelimit-Limit: 10000 Ratelimit-Remaining: 9835 Ratelimit-Reset: 25173 Set-Cookie: espaceMembreCookieName=s%3ARtektzZZ0zeEQVGxwPfEdsGCf7Uj460z.%2BhT9ZLfb3CKzlvwCmqobRRvI%2FiyzzeSan4SVarh2pEc; Path=/; Expires=Sun, 10 Dec 2023 10:03:33 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=Lax Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: Origin, Accept-Encoding X-Powered-By: Express X-Request-Id: 16e47c55-97dc-4816-b7f3-f35be2cd0b0e Espace-Membre BetaGouv

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: espace-membre.incubateur.net
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized Connection: close Content-Length: 139 Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 03 Dec 2023 10:04:39 GMT Ratelimit-Limit: 10000 Ratelimit-Remaining: 9297 Ratelimit-Reset: 25107 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: Origin, Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Powered-By: Express X-Request-Id: 0ba19f6c-ce1c-457d-9b4c-f4b6b7d5a913 Error 
Unauthorized
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: espace-membre.incubateur.net' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://espace-membre.incubateur.net/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
